pyevolcomp.Algorithms.HillClimb module#

class HillClimb(pop_init: Initializer, perturb_op: Operator = None, selection_op: SurvivorSelection = None, params: ParamScheduler | dict = {}, name: str = 'HillClimb')[source]#

Bases: Algorithm

Hill Climbing algorithm

perturb(indiv_list, objfunc, progress=0, history=None)[source]#

Performs a step of the algorithm

update_params(progress=0)[source]#

Updates the parameters of each component of the algorithm

pyevolcomp.Algorithms.NoSearch module#

class NoSearch(pop_init: Initializer, name: str = 'No search')[source]#

Bases: Algorithm

Debug Algorithm that does nothing

perturb(parent_list, pop_init, objfunc, progress=0, history=None)[source]#

Applies operators to the population in some way Returns the offspring generated.

pyevolcomp.Algorithms.StaticPopulation module#

class StaticPopulation(pop_init: Initializer, operator: Operator, parent_sel_op: ParentSelection = None, selection_op: SurvivorSelection = None, params: ParamScheduler | dict = {}, name: str = 'stpop')[source]#

Bases: Algorithm

Population-based algorithm where each individual is iteratively evolved with a given operator

select_parents(population, progress=0, history=None)[source]#

Selects the individuals that will be perturbed in this generation Returns the whole population if not implemented.

perturb(parent_list, objfunc, progress=0, history=None)[source]#

Applies operators to the population in some way Returns the offspring generated.

select_individuals(population, offspring, progress=0, history=None)[source]#

Selects the individuals that will pass to the next generation. Returns the offspring if not implemented.

update_params(progress=0)[source]#

Updates the parameters and the operators

pyevolcomp.Algorithms.VariablePopulation module#

class VariablePopulation(pop_init: Initializer, operator: Operator, parent_sel_op: ParentSelection = None, selection_op: SurvivorSelection = None, n_offspring: int = None, params: ParamScheduler | dict = {}, name: str = 'stpop')[source]#

Bases: Algorithm

Population-based optimization algorithm where the number of individuals generated is different from the size of the population

perturb(parent_list, objfunc, progress=0, history=None)[source]#

Applies operators to the population in some way Returns the offspring generated.

select_individuals(population, offspring, progress=0, history=None)[source]#

Selects the individuals that will pass to the next generation. Returns the offspring if not implemented.

update_params(progress=0)[source]#

Updates the parameters and the operators
